snippet: The Writers Guild nominees fleshed out the picture for awards watchers, with only “American Hustle” and “Dallas Buyers Clubs” among the contenders with nods from three guilds. Meanwhile, “Inside Llewyn Davis” was left off all three lists.
abstract: The Writers Guild nominees fleshed out the picture for awards watchers, with only “American Hustle” and “Dallas Buyers Clubs” among the contenders with nods from three guilds. Meanwhile, “Inside Llewyn Davis” was left off all three lists.

headline.main: Momentum Builds for 'Hustle' and 'Dallas' as 'Llewyn' Lags
